name: echo_city
prompt: A city built entirely out of echoes—each street a memory of a sound. People navigate by resonance, not sight.
decoded: In this city, every street is a memory of a sound, and people navigate by resonance, not sight. The city is built entirely of echoes, with each street representing a different sound. People move through the city by following the resonance of the sounds, rather than relying on their sight to see the streets.
